pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static wide shot of the Tyrell Corporation pyramid from the film *Blade Runner*. A small flying vehicle, known as a spinner, slowly descends toward a landing pad at the very top of the massive, city-like structure. Another bright light, possibly a searchlight from another vehicle, sweeps across the sky from the right side of the frame.
